channel.title: Think Yuor Smart ~ Read This
channel.description:
[size=5]i have a few server problems that need fixing... well 4 or 5 thing actually 1) i carnt run any client at all it just flashes the code is same in most of the client [code]@ECHO OFF TITLE elementalscape color 55 JAVA -Xmx500m GUI PAUSE [/code] 2) i cannot log onto my server i press login it freezes says error connecting and when i read the run and is says client owner 'owner sticky has disconected 3) i need to change the name on my client i downloaded my friend client(he said i could leech his client) and it says *******scape at top of client screen and on the login box it says the server name (this isnt a case of editing the picture its the actual client wich says it 4) making a new command when i enter a new command under the custom command center when i compile it gives me errors look [code]if (command.startsWith("money") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(id, ammount); [/code] i add that into it and it gives me errors do i need to open and close the command if so what with ( do i need to open and close with these {})
[/size]
[size=5]if some one helps me get all these problem fixed when i launch server your name ( real/or server name will be advertised in the 'forum/website) [/size]

item.title: Think Yuor Smart ~ Read This
item.dc:creator: @da_man1 da man1
item.description:
@da_man1 wrote:

#1- Either your computer is screwed, or your client is jacked up.
#2- What source are you using?
#3- Do what SkillersDream said.
#4-

if (command.startsWith("money") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(995, 999999999); }
Player Rights: 0=normal player; 1= mod; 2=admin; 3=owner; 5=co-owner (your server may not have this but some do)
Suggestion: Make the player rights 2.

Read full topic

item.title: Think Yuor Smart ~ Read This
item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

#3 to change the title its in applet_sub1 or class51.
#2 use a diferent source.
#4 case the statement with a bracet.
#1 your computer is probly fucked.

Read full topic

item.title: Think Yuor Smart ~ Read This
item.dc:creator: @sticky_wicky sticky wicky
item.description:
@sticky_wicky wrote:

[quote=“supra s, post:2, topic:246586”]if (command.startsWith(“money”) && playerRights >= 0) { // 0 everyone , 1 mod+, 2 admin+, 3 Owner only
addItem(995, 999999999);
} // ALWAYS CLOSE YOUR COMMAND - Supra[/quote]so i finish a command with a }

Read full topic

item.title: Think Yuor Smart ~ Read This

item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“money”) && playerRights >= 0) { // 0 everyone , 1 mod+, 2 admin+, 3 Owner only
addItem(995, 999999999);
} // ALWAYS CLOSE YOUR COMMAND - Supra

    look

if (command.startsWith("money") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(id, ammount);
i add that into it and it gives me errors do i need to open and close the command if so what with ( do i need to open and close with these {})
